text: Goodmayes is a district in North East London, England. It is a suburban development in the London Borough of Redbridge and forms part of the Ilford post town, situated approximately two miles to the east of Ilford town centre. Historically part of Essex, it was part of the Municipal Borough of Ilford until 1965 when it was incorporated into Greater London. == References == Category:Areas of London Category:London Borough of Redbridge
title: Goodmayes
